title: 0xc0000022
body: Does anyone know how to solve this 0xc0000022 error? I've tried most of the common solutions but they don't work for me. I don't have avast so I don't know why it isn't working.

replies.body: This could be happening for a few reasons like a permissions issue, anti-virus software, or corrupt game file.  As a first step, go over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to rule out the possibility of OS settings blocking access.  Let me know if your issue persists!
